main event: A civilian observed an aluminum sphere reflecting light in Athens, Ohio, on 20 November 1967.
interesting points: The object was identified later as a hot air balloon by the observer., The object emitted a yellowish-orange glow., The sighting lasted approximately 2-3 minutes., The observer was with others at the time of the sighting., The document mentions the object's reflective properties and its box-like top.
sighted object: an aluminum sphere with a box-like top
witness description: A civilian and another individual were present during the observation.
